SA10n1051:1: atrāha - yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate,
SA10n1051:4: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ |
SA10n1051:11: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1051:12: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati |
SA10n1051:13: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān ||2 ||
SA10n1051:14: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt |
SA10n1051:19: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam,
SA10n1051:20: evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti |
SA10n1051:24: sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ | yasmāt -
SA10n1051:28: so'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ |
SA10n1051:30: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
SA10n1051:31: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam |
SA10n1051:32: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam -
SA10n1051:33: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate |
SA10n1051:36: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam,
SA10n1051:37: evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam |
SA10n1051:38: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam,
SA10n1051:40: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti ||3 ||
SA10n1051:47: yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ,
SA10n1051:48: tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam ||4 ||
SA10n1051:49: kiṃ cānyat - iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10n1051:53: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca |
SA10n1051:54: adarśanamapi na paśyati darśanakriyārahitatvādaṅgūlyaya vadityābhiprāyaḥ | yadā
SA10n1051:55: paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam | tadā
SA10n1051:59: ye tu manyante - nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,
SA10n1051:72: kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā |
SA10n1051:73: niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam ||iti |
SA10n1051:87: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān ||
SA10n1051:92: na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ |
SA10n1051:93: asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma |
SA10n1051:104: tadā siddhasya vā darśanāpekṣā syādasiddhasya vā |
SA10n1051:105: tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate |
SA10n1051:106: kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt?
SA10n1051:107: na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti |
SA10n1051:113: tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā -
SA10n1051:114: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ ||6 ||
SA10n1051:115: draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
SA10n1051:120: iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate |
SA10n1051:130: iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam |
SA10n1051:137: yadā tu draṣṭavyadarśanābhāvādvijñānādi catuṣṭayaṃ naivāsti, tadā -
SA10n1051:141: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ |
SA10n1051:145: na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca |
SA10n1051:146: etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate ||
SA10n1051:151: no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi ||
SA10n1051:155: na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati ||
SA10n1051:157: sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam |
SA10n1051:158: naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ ||
SA10n1051:160: yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci ||
SA10n1051:161: yo'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ |
SA10n1051:162: saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ || iti ||
SA10n1051:164: gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ
SA10n1051:167: kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi || iti ||
